# documentContextAfterInput

**Instance Property**

Textual context after the insertion point in the current text input object.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var documentContextAfterInput: String? { get }
```

## Obtaining textual context around the insertion point

- **documentContextBeforeInput**: Textual context before the insertion point in the current text input object.
